Name: BOTS
About the game: BOTS is a high intensity, lightning fast couch coop, solo dev, Indie game. Pit yourself against waves of AI and up to 3 other players in a split screen survival mayhem. Unlock color schemes, levels and new Bots as you play. No downtime, just instant fun! Leaderboards 15 Color Schemes 9 Playable BOTS 9 Procedurally generated Levels 20 Unlockable Achievements 6 Unique game modes 1.2.7 Update now available! Future content includes GameModes, Campaign, Online, and lots of new Levels, Bots and Enemy types. So get it while it's cheap!
Meta Title: BOTS: Dec 5, 2019, KeyWheel and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BOTS? Check out the release date (Dec 5, 2019), developer insights from KeyWheel, and a complete game summary.
